```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
sidebarPanel(
    selectInput(inputId = "dist",
                label = "Distribution:",
                choices = c("Normal"      = "rnorm",
                            "Lognormal"   = "rlnorm",
                            "Uniform"     = "runif",
                            "F"           = "rf",
                            "t"           = "rt"),
                selected = "rnorm"),
    
    br(),
    
    sliderInput("mean", "Mean", min = -5, max = 5, step = .1, value = 0),
    sliderInput("std", "Standard Deviation", min = 0.01, max = 5, step = 0.1, value = 1),
    sliderInput("range", "Range", min = -100, max = 100, value = c(-5, 5)))

plotOutput("dPlot")
```

```{r, context="server"}
output$dPlot <- renderPlot({
  
  if (input$dist == 'rnorm'){ # Normal
    range <- seq(input$range[1], input$range[2], .1)
    plot(range,
         dnorm(range, mean = input$mean, sd = input$std), "l", col = "navyblue", ylab = "Density", xlab = "x", main = "Normal Distribution")
    
  } else if(input$dist == 'rlnorm'){ # Log Normal
    range <- seq(input$range[1], input$range[2], .1)
    plot(range,
         dlnorm(range, mean = input$mean, sd = input$std), "l", col = "navyblue", ylab = "Density", xlab = "x", main = "Lognormal Distribution")

  } else if(input$dist == 'runif'){
    range <- seq(input$range[1], input$range[2], .1)
    plot(range,
         dunif(range, min = input$range[1], max = input$range[2]), "l", col = "navyblue", ylab = "Density", xlab = "x", main = "Uniform Distribution")
    
  } else {plot(c(1, 2, 3), c(3, 2, 1))}
})
```
